doc.field: K'at'eey naa ts'ät ihttheel de' k'ahdu' kon' choh deek'än' nts'ą̈' k'a natįlxiin.
K'at'eey naa ts'ät ihttheel de' k'ahdu' kon' choh deek'än' nts'ą̈' k'a natįlxiin.
If I hadn't chopped wood for you now a big fire wouldn't be burning, and you couldn't warm yourself up again.
